description: A .piv file is a file format used by Pivot Animator, a software used for creating stick figure animations. The .piv file contains the animation data created by the user in the software. The format is specific to Pivot Animator and may not be supported by other animation software.

instructions:
To open a .piv file in Pivot Animator, follow these steps:

Download and install Pivot Animator on your computer if you haven’t already.Open Pivot Animator.Select “File” > “Open” from the menu.Navigate to the location of the .piv file you want to open.Select the .piv file and click “Open.”The animation will be loaded and displayed in Pivot Animator.You can now edit the animation or play it by selecting “Play” > “Play Animation.”
